name: MixingLink
details:
High quality mic pre with FX loop in a compact form factorFX loop send and return supports balanced and unbalanced signals - interfaces with consoles or guitar pedals easily
Latching or momentary footswitch control of FX loop for performance effects
Works with a wide range of microphones including condenser and ribbon mics with up to 65dB of clean gain
Aux I/O connection supporting stereo input and send
Guitar amp output and headphone monitor output with separate master volume control
Note: size of this pedal is WRONG in the manual. What's here is closer.
https://www.eventideaudio.com/products/accessory/mic-pre-fx-loop/mixinglink
